name: SICCEContrAll
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: s. d. c. pump
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SICCE ContrAll lets you control your SICCE ContrAll devices with Alexa.
List of available commands: set device, turn on, turn off, temperature, set power to, raise power by, reduce power by.
Compatible with the following SICCE products:
- Syncra SDC 6.0 - 7.0 - 9.0
- Syncra SDC 3.0
- PSK SDC 2600 - 4000
- PSK SDC 1200
- XStream SDC
It is necessary to link the SICCE ContrAll app account to use the skill.
